item.title: Making Dragon Claws Donator only?

item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:3, topic:271430”] if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == #### && !(donator == 1)) // unequips weapon if you're not donator. { remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3); sendMessage("You can't wield the d claws"); sendMessage("If you donate you get to hold the power"); PoisonPlayer(); }[/quote]

item.title: Making Dragon Claws Donator only?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

    [code]if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == #### && !(donator == 1)) // unequips weapon if you're not donator.
    {
        remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3);
        sendMessage("You can't wield the d claws");
        sendMessage("If you donate you get to hold the power");
        PoisonPlayer();
    }[/code]

item.title: Making Dragon Claws Donator only?
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

[quote=“noobie22, post:1, topic:271430”]I have no idea how to do this, so I can’t provide any help. Sorry.

Anyways, I need some help on this.[/quote]

What is your d claws id?

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == #### && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name here")) // unequips weapon if your name isn't in the list { remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3); sendMessage("You can't wield the d claws"); sendMessage("If you donate you get to hold the power"); PoisonPlayer(); }

is where ur d claws id goes

Hope i helped

just add that to your client.class
